Text.Page:
Whew! I've been drawing up evacuation contingency plans all day. My usual business is going by the wayside.

I haven't even followed up with young...Gumbi? Gamilon? The youngster running the southern gate.

It sounded urgent. Can you do an old man a favor?

Thanks for coming. Old Bisi's been so busy I'm surprised he remembered! Camp Vigilance, south of there, is full of plague researchers, and that pack of {@LinkCreature:15#3#sulking inky sabertooths} has cut them off. Could you clear a path?

Sabertooth fangs! Much prefer them outside the sabertooth's mouth, don't you?

Say, are you free to help with another little problem?
I'd rather have a dozen sabertooth fangs in my hand than a pair in the back of my neck. You're working on that, aren't you?
